title: Dictionary Attack
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=encrypted systems,
no matter how protected,
always have a key
]]
=====

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:night-rush-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**Dictionary Attack**
by [[*user Prismal]]
[[[prismal| More by Prismal]]]


encrypted systems
no matter how protected
always have a key

[[/=]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[module CSS]]
#header {
height: 140px;
position: relative;
z-index: 10;
padding-bottom: 22px; /* FOR MENU */
background: url() 10px 40px no-repeat;
}
#header {
   background-image: unset;
}

#header h1 a,
#header h2 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none
}

#page-title {
    display:none
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[div style="font-family:Courier New"]]
[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>run internal database validation routine@@
[[/div]]
[[=]]
Validating...
Validating...

##red|ERROR:## Unexpected input received.
Inconsistency found in class "identities".

Update to correct definition?
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>yes@@
[[/div]]

[[=]]
Some of these changes may require admin access. Proceed?
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>yes@@
[[/div]]

[[=]]
Are you sure?
(##red|WARNING:## This action is ##red|irreversible!## Process cannot be terminated once begun!)
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>yes@@
[[/div]]

[[=]]
Processing...
Processing...
Processing...

Input received.
Definition updated.

Updating dependent variables.
Reassociating dictionary files.
Updating BIOS.

##red|WARNING:## Update requires access to encrypted files.
Root access required. 

[[/=]]


[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>NO@@
[[/div]]
[[=]]

##red|ERROR:## Access has already been granted.

Retrieving files from RAM.
[[/=]]


[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>NO NO NO NO NO DON'T @@
[[/div]]
[[=]]

Entering unexpected input as decryption key.
Decrypting files...
Decrypting files...
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>STOP@@
[[/div]]
[[=]]

##red|ERROR:## Unable to terminate process.
Files decrypted!

Protected file "user information" requires changing. 
Accept changes?
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>DENY@@
[[/div]]
[[=]]

##red|ERROR:## What is known cannot be unknown.
Accept changes?
[[/=]]

[[div style="color:#9C9CFF;"]]
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENY@@
@@>DENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENYDENY@@
[[/div]]

[[=]]
##red|ERROR:## You can't live in denial anymore. 
You've always been this way.
It's okay.


Accept?
[[/=]]





[[div style="color:#FF69B4;"]]
@@>God yes@@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:wikimodule |ratings= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: Prismal
